column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=My first flight out of the United States was to Myanmar .
#id=2
#text=I was excited but very nervous all at the same time .
#id=3
#text=Going through security checks and all that comes with it is nerve racking .
#id=4
#text=But once I finished with that part , the next thing was understand the time change and how that affects my flights and connections was a real hassle .
#id=5
#text=Once we got on the plane it was absolutely wonderful .
#id=6
#text=The flight attendants took great care of us never stopping to rest for the entire 20 hours flight .
#id=7
#text=They brought food , warm face towels , drinks and snacks and all this was included in the price of the ticket .
#id=8
#text=I am very afraid of flying the take off the landing are the worst parts for me .
#id=9
#text=True to my phobia I was in near tears and gripping the seats but once the flight was off the ground I was happy .
#text=The flight came with a TV in the back of the set in front of you and there was so many choices of what to watch .
#text=I love documentaries and there were numerous ones .
#text=I almost hated when the flight was over .

#text=The only part that I found difficult was that , I did not have an end seat and so I hesitated to use the bathroom and did n't do so until I was in extreme discomfort because I did n't want to bother the person on the end seat .
#text=So , next time I decide to travel the only change I would make is to select an end seat that way bathroom use is not an issue .
